snippet: In what it says is one of the biggest changes to its search results, Google will begin showing posts, photos, profiles and conversations from Google+, its social network, in search results.
abstract: In what it says is one of the biggest changes to its search results, Google will begin showing posts, photos, profiles and conversations from Google+, its social network, in search results.

headline.main: Google Adds Posts From Its Social Network to Search Results
headline.print_headline: Google Adds Social Network to Search Results
